workout_file.author: Zwift
workout_file.name: Week 3.1 - Watopia Hilly Reverse
workout_file.description: A race simulation on Watopia Hilly Reverse where you'll tackle 3 laps of the course.

textevent.message: Welcome to another race simulation workout!
We'll tackle Watopia Hilly Reverse today, but 1st let's get warmed up.
Aim for a comfortable cadence here.
That's halfway through today's warmup. Let's chat about what's in store today.
As you know, today is a race simulation of Watopia Hilly Reverse.
And like other hilly courses on Zwift, when the road points up things get tough.
So, expect to work very hard at times today, and especially over the climb feature.
We'll also chat about how the course usually plays out in a race.
And provide some tips and tricks for success.
For now though, let's carry on with today's warmup.
In 30sec, we're going to do a couple high cadence efforts to ensure the legs are awake.
Spin those legs up, aim for 110+ RPM!
GO GO GO! FAST FEET!
Good work, back to a comfortable cadence again.
Let's go! Get those legs spinning quick!
Excellent work! Now we'll take a moment and spin easy.
Deep breaths here, we have the start coming up next :-).
All right, get ready to BLAST off the line!
Start spinning the legs up again, and make sure to make the lead group!
GO GO GO! Get up to speed quickly!
Good work! Just a short flat section now before we head up to the Esses.
Climbing up to the Esses now, just stay in the group here and keep in control.
Surge over the Esses and ease off the gas going downhill.
Gaps will usually form here, so make sure you're staying in contact.
The final hill is the steepest, hang on!
GO GO GO! Stay with the group.
Phew! This race starts tough! Easy down the hill towards the sprint banner.
Things will settle down now as we wind through the village, but keep the pressure on!
Breathe, use this time to take a sip of fluid and recover.
Hard surge as we leave the village!
Recover on the downhill here. This is the last chance to before we start the climb.
Onto the flats again leading up to the 1st time up the hill.
This climb starts VERY steep, but then levels out.
So, expect everyone to go wild on the 1st bit, then mellow out in the middle.
Here we go! Get ready to put some work in.
GO GO GO! Start off hard and make the selection!
C'mon! Keep the pressure on! Things will flatten out soon.
Almost to the crest of the steep section!
Very quick descent now, breathe.
Now the climb continues at a much less steep gradient. Keep the pressure on.
Stay in the draft in this section, the field is moving quickly enough to capitalize on it.
Almost to the banner, then we'll descend back into town again.
Phew! That's the 1st climb done! Good work staying with the group.
Steady as you go now through town towards the start banner.
This is another great section to relax and recover.
Back onto the climb towards the Esses, get ready to put some work in again.
Stay with the group through the Esses and don't get gapped off the back!
BIG EFFORT over the last climb of the Esses. GO GO!
Nicely done! Let's recover through the sprint banner now.
And back onto the flats winding through the village.
Get ready for a potential early move before the climb itself.
GO GO GO! Short and sharp climb out of town.
Great work! Everyone is still together. Recover a bit here before the climb.
Steady here, don't get excited before the steep section and save your energy.
Once you pass Scotty's house on your right, you know things are about to get tough!
Here we go! Keep the pressure on over this steep section!
Halfway through, keep the gaps closed and stay in the group!
C'mon! Get over this section and you can get to the top in the group!
Excellent! Take a couple breaths here over this short section.
Back onto the climb again! Remember to stay in the wheels here and save your energy.
Some may try and attack before the banner, so stay vigilant here.
Almost to the top, then we'll coast down the hill again.
Great work! That's 2 climbs down and just 1 more to go! Nice and easy now.
Steady tempo now as we wind through town again towards the start banner.
Bell lap, my friend! Just stay with the group through the Esses again.
And save your energy for the final climb!
Back through the Esses again, power going up and easy going down.
Get ready to power up this final steep hill.
HAMMER IT!
Nicely done! Take it easy now here.
All right, back onto the flats once again through the village.
Attacks will likely happen here as we exit the village, pay attention!
Easy...Take some deep breaths now.
Okay, the final climb is just ahead. You got this!
Power up! This will get REALLY tough over this last climb, stay with it!
UP UP UP!! C'mon now!
Almost to the top of the 1st part, great work!
Power on again! Things will be tough again here as people make their moves.
Don't get dropped!
Keep the pressure on! Almost to the top!
Great! You've made it over the top with the group! Recover now and get ready for the sprint!
Here we go! Back on the gas again and get into position for the sprint.
You don't want to be on the front as the sprint starts, aim for 4th or 5th wheel.
GO GO GO! WORK THROUGH EVERYONE!
KEEP THE PRESSURE ON!
Incredible work today! Way to finish strong.
We're going to take a few minutes and cooldown now, you earned it!
See you next time :-)
